name: premid
description: PreMiD is a simple, configurable utility to allow you to show what you're watching in your Discord now playing status. It supports many different platforms, and will also support multiple users watching the same content simultaneously in an upcoming update.

scripts.installer-mac: npm run pkgmac && electron-installer-dmg ./out/YT\ Presence-darwin-x64/YT\ Presence.app YT\ Presence\ Installer --overwrite --icon=./appIcon.icns --out=./dist

author: Timeraa
